conversations.conversation:
I never identify myself with my actions. Because you are not always what you do. I break damn rules just to be happy. Yeah, I'm happy doing crazy things. I'll do anything just to make myself happy. You can always see me smiling. I am fearfully and wonderfully made and there's only one ME in the world.
;;)
;
;Some people are trying to pull me down. And i'm PROUD of it. ; Because it only mean one thing, I am above them and one sure reason why they would hate me because they wanted to become just like me ; ADMIT it biatches. =P~
;
;MUSIC is my Girlfriend. because only music can let me reminisce back to my past. There are songs that can really make me cry. Music is the voice of what i feel inside, especially when i'm mute by the words of my mouth.
;
;I don't take anything SERIOUSLY. I just go with the flow. i can be so mean when i want to be. Be Kind. I know my limits. I know my role. ; and and and i believe that life is summed up to three words.. IT GOES ON
